english: Go see, have the bastards drunk too much wine?

english: If you don't go, Ertuğrul will come and find you.

text: Ölme. Bana tek bir şey söyle.
english: Don't die, just tell me one thing.
Who's the one with the blackout?
- What?
Don't die, you are!

text: Ölme Bahaddin. Moğollar sana dahi acımadılar…
english: Don't die, Bahaddin, the Mongols didn't even feel sorry for you...

text: …bari son nefesinde doğru bir iş yap.
english: ...do the right thing in your last breath.
